title: My Client gets repaired at last minute when I started my game giving me a bug splat demoted
body: Because of this client last minute as I start my game the client repairs it self making me get demoted down to silver 3. Are you kidding me bring me back to silver 2 riot. YOUR MAKING ME RAGE

replies.body: Hey that sucks.  :(  The client checks your game files through the patching server before getting you in, so either some kind of corruption must have happened midway or your drivers are having problems rendering game assets.  Your best bet is to go over the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this, but test it in a custom game first!
